SA20vmvkbh_u:1156: yathā māyākṛtaṃ na vidyata upalabhyate ca yadi prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā dharmāṇāṃ tat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃkleśaḥ paścād vyavadānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1161: yady aprameyabuddhotpāde saty aprameyāṇāṃ satvānāṃ kleśāpaśamaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1162: tat kathaṃ na saṃsārasamucchedo na nirvāṇavṛddhir bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1166: yatra yā ca yato bhrāntir abhrāntir yā ca yatra ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1167: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiva paryantaś ca tayor iti //
SA20vmvkbh_u:1169: akalpanā prakṛtyā ca bhāsvaratvaṃ sadaiva hi //
SA20vmvkbh_u:1174: antadvayavarjane pratipattiḥ katamā yā ratnakūṭe madhyamā pratipattir upadiṣṭā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1180: vikalpadvayatāntaś ca sa ca saptavidho mataḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1187: ekatvam ity antaḥ tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1189: yāvan na mānavapratyavekṣā ātmadarśane hi jīvas tac charīraṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1190: anyo jīvo 'nyac charīram iti bhavati darśanaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1193: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yā rūpādīnāṃ na nityapratyavekṣā nānityapratyavekṣā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1194: ātmeti pudgalasamāropāntaḥ nairātmyam ity apavādāntaḥ prajñaptisato 'py apavādāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1195: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad ātmanairātmyayor madhyaṃ nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1196: bhūtaṃ cittam iti dharmasamāropāntaḥ abhūtam ity apavādāntaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1197: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yatra na cittaṃ na cetanā na mano na vijñānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1199: kuśalādayo vyavadānam iti pratipakṣāntas tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yo 'syāntadvayasyānupagamo 'nudāhāro 'pravyāhāraḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1200: astīti śāśvatāntas tayor eva pudgaladharmayor nāstīty ucchedāntas tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad anayor dvayor antayor madhyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1202: evaṃ vidyā saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca tatpratipakṣaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1203: yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ cety antas tannirodho grāhyo grāhako vety anto yena mārgeṇa tan nirudhyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1204_1: madhyamā pratipad vidyā cāvidyā cādvayam etad iti vistareṇa vidyāvidyādīnāṃ grāhyagrāhakatvābhāvāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1211: yasya pratipakṣo jñānaśūnyatā jñānānimittaṃ jñānāpraṇihitaṃ ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1216: punarbhavaprabandhaś ca yasya pratipakṣo jñānājātiḥ jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1219: jñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmā etena trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogaṃ yāvan na śūnyatādayaḥ kriyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1220: prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādayo dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt tena yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśudhyate veti kalpayaty ayam antaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1223: yan na śūnyatayā dharmāñ chūnyāṃ karoti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1224: api tu dharmā eva śūnyā ity evamādi /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1225: aparaḥ saptavidho vikalpadvayāntas tad yathā bhāve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1226: abhāve 'pi pudgalo 'sti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā [Mvbh_72] nairātmyam api vā nāstīti kalpanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1227: tad etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham iyaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1228: na khalu pudgalavināśāya śūnyatā api tu śūnyataiva śūnyā pūrvāntaśūnyatā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1231: śamane 'pi vikalpo 'nataḥ praheyaprahāṇakalpanayā śūnyatāyās trasanād etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham ākāśadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1232: trāsye 'pi vikalpo 'ntas tataś ca trāsyād bhaye 'pi parikalpitarūpāditrasanāt (/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1234: pūrvako dṛṣṭāntaḥ śrāvakān ārabhyāyaṃ tu bodhisatvān /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1235: grāhye 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ grāhake 'pi etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ māyākāradṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1239: arthābhāve vijñaptyasaṃbhavād ity etad atra sādharmyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1240: samyaktve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ mithyātve 'pi bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ samyaktvena kalpayato mithyātvena vā etasyāntadvayasya parivarjanārthaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1243_0: jātaś ca tad eva kāṣṭhadvayaṃ dahaty evam asamyaktvalakṣaṇāyā yathābhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ
SA20vmvkbh_u:1243_1: samyaktvalakṣaṇam āryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate jātaṃ ca tām eva bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ vibhāvayatīty
SA20vmvkbh_u:1243_2: etad atra sādharmyaṃ na cāsamyaktvalakṣaṇāpi bhūtapratyavekṣā mithyātvalakṣaṇā samyaktvānukūlyāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1245: avyāpṛtāv api jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā kalpayataḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1248_0: ajanmatve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ samakālatve 'pi yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati
SA20vmvkbh_u:1248_1: saṃkleśasyaiva vā dīrghakālatvam etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ dvitīyas
SA20vmvkbh_u:1252: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca jñeyā daśasu bhūmiṣu /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1253: yasyāṃ bhūmau yā pāramitātiriktatarā sā tatra viśiṣṭā sarvāsu ca sarvatra samudāgacchatīty aviśiṣṭā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1260: pragamaḥ praśaṭhatvaṃ ca prakarṣālambanaṃ mataṃ // V.28
SA20vmvkbh_u:1263: yad uta dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānālambanaṃ dharmadhātvālambanaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1270: tatra prathamaṃ ye pāramitādayo dharmā vyavasthāpyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1271: dvitīyan tathatā tṛtīyacaturthe te eva yathākramaṃ dharmadhātuprativedhena pāramitādidharmādhigamāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1280: ekādaśam aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau dvādaśaṃ navamyādibhūmitraye tad eva hi prathamadvayaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1281: tasyān tasyām avasthāyāṃ tattadālambanaṃ nāma labhate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1303: madhyamāpratipatprakāśanāt madhyāntavibhāgam apy etan madhyasyāntayoś ca prakāśanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1318: sā ca pratipattir yādṛśī paramā / yena ca
SA20vmvkbh_u:1321: yathā yena prakāreṇāvikṣepapariṇatā ca śamathabhāvanayā aviparyāsapariṇatā ca vipaśyanābhāvanayā/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1322: yadarthaṃ ca madhyamayā pratipadā niryāṇārthaṃ / yatra ca
SA20vmvkbh_u:1338: // vyākhyām imām upanibadhya yad asti puṇyaṃ
SA20vmvkbh_u:1341: bodhitrayaṃ ca na cirāj jagad aśnuvīta //
